content.en_US: An ashpit can be placed under certain machines to collect ashes. [[Fireboxes|Firebox]] and [[heating ovens|Heating Oven]] will produce types of ash depending on the fuel used. [[Smokestacks|Smokestack]] create fly ash, with industrial smokestacks in particular also producing small amounts of fine soot, the raw material used for making [[fullerite|Fullerite]].
